backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister declaring an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing two Brain Dump UI changes and their affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of concise summaries for all frontend source files covering components, hooks, utilities, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables with light/dark palettes and global style application.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading fonts and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Thin wrapper that renders the FocusExecutionApp component.
frontend/src/components/BrainDumpView.ts: Brain Dump UI enabling text-to-task conversion, category suggestions, editing, and speech input.
Button component that triggers returning to the Focus view.
frontend/src/components/TaskEnergyAssist: Chat-style assistant that classifies tasks by energy category and supports applying suggestions.
frontend/src/FocusExecutionApp.jsx: Main application component handling task flow, energy state, timers, modals, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook for creating and updating a backend actor based on Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Implements a speech‑to‑text hook using the Web Speech API, handling recognition lifecycle, errors, and transcript state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, fonts, Tailwind layers, warm color themes, dark mode variables, and custom animations and shadows.
Extracts individual tasks from freeform text using heuristics for bullets, numbering, separators, and conjunctions.
frontend/src/lib/taskEnergyClassifier.ts: Classifies tasks into energy categories based on keyword matching, complexity, and time hints, returning a deterministic result.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with typography, container queries, animations, custom OKLCH color system, shadows, container settings, and extended keyframes.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, architecture notes, features, known issues, and metadata for a React-based focus/task management app.
